articles.title: Depression: Eating mushrooms may reduce risk - Medical News Today
articles.description: A new study investigates whether or not regularly consuming mushrooms might reduce the risk of developing depression. The authors conclude that it might.

• A new study from Penn State finds an association between eating mushrooms every day and a lower likelihood of experiencing depression.
